text: Mattie Parker (born 1983 or 1984) is an American politician. She has been the Mayor of Fort Worth, Texas since 2021. She was the youngest mayor of a major American city when she was elected. Parker was elected mayor after winning 54% of the vote in the 2021 election. ==References== Category:1980s births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Fort Worth Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Mattie Parker
